name: Ext_R5_EpisodeOfCare_di_condition
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The medical condition that was addressed during the episode of care
element.definition: The medical condition that was addressed during the episode of care, expressed as a text, code or a reference to another resource.
element.comment: `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition` maps to R4B `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
